Training

The following tertiary institutions in Australia and New Zealand offer training in language technology or closely related areas such as natural language processing, speech technology and computational linguistics.

This page is under construction.Â To have your institution's offerings listed here, please complete the ACL NLP Course Survey then notify the ALTA webmaster.

Macquarie University

  • SLP148: Language, Logic and Computation
  • COMP248: Language Technology
  • COMP348: Document Processing and the Semantic Web
  • COMP349: Spoken Language Dialogue Systems

University of Melbourne

  • 175-410: Computational Linguistics
  • 433-460: Human Language Technology
  • 433-467: Text and Document Management

For any comments or questions about these pages please contact the ALTA secretary.
